wikipedia_page.main: James Moir MacKenzie (17 October 1886 – 22 January 1963) was a Scotland international rugby union player. He was the 62nd President of the Scottish Rugby Union.

response: *James MacKenzie (rugby union) (1886–1963), Scottish international rugby union player
*James MacKenzie (VC) (1889–1914), Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross
